Hi, I'm Daniel Thiele. I am a Research Associate at [Weizenbaum Institute](https://www.weizenbaum-institut.de/portrait/p/daniel-thiele/){target="_blank"}, Berlin, c/o Free University Berlin, and a PhD candidate in political science at University of Vienna. In my [research](https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0324-4943){target="_blank"}, I focus on political communication on social media, citizen-generated communication, and populism. I have a strong interest in computational methods and try to contribute useful R-packages [here](https://github.com/thieled){target="_blank"}.

You can contact me at my [new email address](mailto:daniel.thiele@fu-berlin.de) and find out more about my work here::
